frame.name: Reliance_on_expectation
frame.definition:
<def-root>A <fen>Cognizer</fen> takes a certain <fen>Expectation</fen> to be a reliable fact, such that their plans can be based on it.
<ex><fex name="Cognizer">I</fex> can always <t>count</t> <t>on</t> <fex name="Expectation">him being late to work</fex> <fex name="Circumstances">when it's raining</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Cognizer
FE.definition: <def-root>An individual that considers the Expectation certain.</def-root>

FE.name: Expectation
FE.definition:
<def-root>The fact which the <fen>Cognizer</fen> depends on in planning for the future.
<ex>I think you should <t>count</t> <fex name="Expectation">on getting a paycut</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Circumstances
FE.definition:
<def-root>The situation in which the <fen>Cognizer</fen> can count on the <fen>Expectation</fen>.
<ex><fex name="Circum">When investing in such a volatile area</fex>, you can <t>bank</t> on getting burned a few times.</ex></def-root>

lexUnit.name: bank (on).v
lexUnit.definition: COD: base one's hopes or confidence on.

lexUnit.name: count (on).v
lexUnit.definition: FN: confidently expect to occur, such that plans can be made.
